name: Cirilium
description: The main character of Spit Jeffer, an ordinary office plankton, but suddenly the unexpected began, the collapse of the whole world began, which was arranged by the Great Rogue Drakid with one of the 5 parts of the great artifact. Many people turned into terrifying monsters, but only the main character was able to resist the villain's spell and now he has to stop the villain from collecting 5 pieces of the artifact to free the people and save this world.
